title: Appreciation Map
name: Appreciation Map
description:
A Map by Jpfromjp

The Appreciation Map honors the people and places who have contributed to our lives and communities and inspires others to do the same by sharing stories, pictures, and videos of places where contributions have been made.

properties.description: Posted by Jpfromjp
Posted by Jpfromjp
Posted by Jpfromjp

properties.name: Aunt Dot
properties.description: Posted by JpfromjpI met Aunt Dot at Saint Micheals College in 1996 smoking a but outside of Founders Hall. Since then Aunt Dot and I have been tight. She been a great friend and is an awesome woman. Love ya Aunt Dot!

properties.name: Bella Luna Restaurant and the Milky Way Lounge and Lanes, 403 and 405 Centre St., Jamaica Plain, MA 02130
properties.description: Posted by JpfromjpÂ The management of Bella Luna and Milky Way donate over 0,000 every year to the community of Jamaica Plain. They have also graciously supported Neighbors for Neighbors by hosting out Neighborhood Social and Community Organizing Expos at no charge and providing free appetizers. Thank you.

properties.name: Ben's Cabin
properties.description: Posted by JpfromjpBen was one of my best friends in High School. Ben gave me friendship, pat methany, philosophy, new friends, and even helped me graduate from high school by tutoring me in Chemistry almost every night during the spring of 1994. He also brough home Jenny. Ben took his life on March 25, 2005.

properties.name: Canaan Street Lake
properties.description: Posted by JpfromjpSince my family moved to Canaan NH in 1992, Canaan Street Lake has been one my favorite places on earth. From rides around the lake with Dan and Betty Fletham, to days spent with my friend Maggie and Frank family, that early morning back in 1993 sitting by the lake and realized that Nature will always be a companion, and the afternoon spent floating on the Middle of the lake on 9/12/2002. I appreciate the universe creating Canan Steet Lake.

properties.name: Claire helped write the Appreciation Map purpose statment
properties.description: Posted by JpfromjpOn April 29, at the June Bug Cafe, Claire helped me write the Appreciation Map purpose statement: The Appreciation Map honors those who have contributed to our lives and communities and inspires others to do the same by sharing stories, pictures, and videos of places where contributions have been made.

properties.name: John Kluge
properties.description: Posted by JpfromjpIn my senior year I had an english teacher who encouraged me to explore my philosophical thoughts. Mr. Kluge encouragement greatly influenced who I am today. Thanks.

properties.name: Joseph Choo
properties.description: Posted by JpfromjpThis is where I met my friend Joseph Choo. Joseph was a great friend to me during 1995 when I took a semester off from College. Hey Joseph, I appreciate your friendship.

properties.name: Karen Widell
properties.description: Posted by JpfromjpKaren was first girl I kissed. It was the last day of school when i was in fifth grade at the American School Foundation of Mexico City. I\'ve always loved the ladies.

properties.name: Karen and Racheal Corsey
properties.description: Posted by JpfromjpIn addition to being my sophomore english teacher, Karen and racheal served as my family during the most difficult year of my life. I appreciate you sharing you evening and cookies with me.

properties.name: Prof. Bill Anderson
properties.description: Posted by JpfromjpProf. Anderson was my professor for many of my business classes and was also my advisor. I appreciate him for treating me as student with potential and value. He planted roots of confidence that serve me and those I serve today.

properties.name: Prof. Carole Parker
properties.description: Posted by JpfromjpProf. Carole Parker was my organizational development professor and is currently my friend. She taught me the 14 P\'s and that change will be embraced when those who the change effects have to be apart of the planning of that change and understand it\'s benefits. Parker, I appreciate you!

properties.name: Prof. David Kite
properties.description: Posted by JpfromjpProf. Kite was my philosophy professor at Saint Michael\'s College. He helped me understand and appreciate philisophical literrature by spending countless office hours with me. His time is appreciated.

properties.name: Prof. Robert Letovski
properties.description: Posted by JpfromjpProf. Letovski was my Marketing Prof. I love marketing and he challanged me to push myself beyond my natural abilities. I acknowledge Prof. Letovski for his continued support.

properties.name: Seth and Carrie Albourne
properties.description: Posted by JpfromjpSeth and Carrie Albourne and their family were very supportive to my during my first few months away from home.

properties.name: The creek
properties.description: Posted by JpfromjpThis is the creek I played in when i lived in Skillman and and off from 1985 to 1994. The majority of my childhood memories are around this creek. Every child derserves a forest to play in.

properties.name: WWPV 88.7 FM
properties.description: Posted by JpfromjpThe Saint Michael\'s College Radio Station were I learned to spin from 1995 to 1998 on my radio shows "Budha and Bear nin the Morning, Budha\'s House and Chicken Soup for your house."
